review_data.title: great place for a drink, good service and decor

review_data.title: Nice small, in crowded, BUT still nice

review_data.title: Good for a night cup and a chat
review_data.content: Always good for a last drink before heading home. Intersting croud that tends to change quite a bit. Once your among banker in suits next time you'll meet a crowd of girls at a hen night... Interesting.

review_data.title: Easy bar 🍺

review_data.title: Chill Out
review_data.content: Such a great spot for our first night in Zurich. Great music but we could still chat away to each other and catch up. Beer was reasonably priced for Zurich too!

review_data.title: Friendly, Nice Place, Good Prices, Good Drinks
review_data.content: After a series of disappointing experiences we were received with a smile, and received prompt attention. The drinks menu is solid, prices are sensible, the atmosphere is relaxed, what more do you want in a bar?
